content.raw:
Update, d179fc2:

  - Added ability to override sdf include description. This is mainly needed by [inertial.sdf](#!/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/237/support-frame-specification-in-sdf/diff#chg-sdf/1.5/inertial.sdf) where we want to provide a more detailed description for the pose element than the generic one in [pose.sdf](#!/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/237/support-frame-specification-in-sdf/diff#chg-sdf/1.5/pose.sdf)

 - added integration test for the override feature
content.html:
Update, d179fc2:

  • Added ability to override sdf include description. This is mainly needed by inertial.sdf where we want to provide a more detailed description for the pose element than the generic one in pose.sdf

  • added integration test for the override feature
